Rogue's revenge

Advanced data
Item ID12856

The rogue's revenge is a cosmetic hat that can be obtained from Ferox once the player has more non target kills than target kills, and at least 1 target kill.

The hat alters its appearance depending on the amount of target kills (assigned target kills in the Bounty Hunter minigame) and rogue kills (non-target kills on Bounty Hunter worlds) the player has; the Hunter's Honour is chosen if the player has more target kills than rogue kills, and the Rogue's Revenge is chosen if the player has more rogue kills than target kills.

Kills will only count on the Bounty Hunter world. This item will be lost upon death to another player in the Wilderness.

Date Changes
12 August 2020
(update)

The item's value was decreased from 40,000 to 1.

13 November 2014
(update)

The Rogue's revenge now has a chathead.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The hat appears to be based on the duellist's cap (tier 6) from RuneScape.

[[File:Rogue's revenge detail.png|left|130px]]
[[File:Rogue's revenge chathead.png|left]]
The '''rogue's revenge''' is a cosmetic hat that can be obtained from [[Ferox]] once the player has more non target kills than target kills, and at least 1 target kill.

The hat alters its appearance depending on the amount of target kills (assigned target kills in the [[Bounty Hunter]] minigame) and rogue kills (non-target kills on Bounty Hunter worlds) the player has; the [[Hunter's Honour]] is chosen if the player has more target kills than rogue kills, and the Rogue's Revenge is chosen if the player has more rogue kills than target kills.

Kills will only count on the [[Bounty Hunter]] world. This item '''will''' be lost upon death to another player in the [[Wilderness]].
